variantdescription: Tupolev Tu-4 base variant. Reverse-engineered from the B-29A. NATO reporting name is Bull.
variantnotes: Gun Turrets. Equipped with ten 23 mm NS-23 cannons in turrets and in the tail. They can fire in any direction. They may return fire twice per game turn in response to a gun attacks or conduct a single attack. The roll to hit is 2/1/1 and the AtA rating is 4. Gun attacks are modified only by the target size and have a -1 modifier when firing into the 60- arc. Ammunition is unlimited.
